parse.title: The Fall of Gondolin, Op. 49 (Vocal Score)

wikitext.*:
[[File:Gondolin Vocal Score Cover.jpg|thumb|Artwork from the Vocal Score by permission of Ted Nasmith.]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2019, the complete Vocal Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[The Fall of Gondolin, Op.49 (Opera)|The Fall of Gondolin, Op. 49 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 114 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete piano reduction of the score with introduction by the composer, synopsis and translations of the Elvish.

Cover Illustration: TED NASMITH ©2019  “Tuor reaches the Hidden City of Gondolin”

[[Category:Music books]]
